name: Unshackled
description:
Unshackled follows the simple story of someone who has found themselves freed from the shackles that once bound them. Confused, they must find a way to escape. However, something seems to be watching...

Unshackled is an abandoned area simulator. This game doesn't contain anything too graphic nor too surprising. I don't think it needs a warning and I also think it's safe to say that  children can play but it's not recommended.

Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • Hold SHIFT to Sprint
  • Mouse to Look Around
  • Left-Click to Interact
  • F to Use Item
  • Hold Q to Quit
